about_the_game:
Engage in thrilling battles against the hordes of enemies

Collect shards dropped by fallen monsters, level up, unlock and upgrade your arsenal of 6 weapons and items in this unique twist on bullet-hell games, where you are the bullet producer!

Survive long enough to face off against the final boss that will put your build to the test!

In Requiem for the Lost World, defeat is just a stepping stone towards inevitable victory.

Many characters with distinct abilities

Unlock the growing cast of over 15 unique characters.

Each one equipped with its weapon, special ability, passive and a set of upgrades that diversify the playing experience.

Challenge the world of Sanctuary with your preferred play style!

Experience the stylized world

Traverse the vast grass fields of the outskirts of the Capital, dive deep into dark dungeons of the Capital's undergrounds, or explore the vast snow plains of the Northern Tundra.

Beautiful VFX and the mix of 2D and 3D graphics will make sure to keep you visually entertained.

Each location is filled with puzzles and points of interest for you to discover.

Powerful upgrades and weapons

Choose from a vast inventory of 100+ weapons and items to build your arsenal strategically.

Every choice you make matters as you prepare to fight and adapt to enemies that may counter your approach.

Mix and match weapons to create powerful elemental reactions to wipe your opponents with.

Upgrade your characters and collect relics

Equip characters with relics and acquire their rank-ups when weapons alone are no longer enough.

Each character benefits from different stats, and it's up to you to find the perfect balance or define your own META build!

With nearly 40 upgradable stats there is plenty to choose from!

Better with others

Tired of playing survivor-like games alone? Try with a friend, or two, or more! Requiem for a Lost World offers an online co-op experience without altering the gameplay loop we all grew to love. Get stronger together, rely on each other to make it till the end!

Or maybe you are a streamer, believing that your chat won't make the gameplay a living hell? With Twitch integration, you can let the chat control your fate. Will they help or make you miserable? 

In a world scarred by a forgotten era, only one sanctuary remains.

Centuries after a global catastrophe turned most of the planet into a wasteland, the people of Sanctuary live in fragile peace, unaware of the dark history that shaped their world. When a mysterious new threat emerges to consume their last refuge, two strangers, Nishi and Amelia, are thrust into a battle against monstrous creatures and ancient forces that defy reality.

As chaos unfolds, Nishi must confront his past, unlock hidden powers, and seek out the legendary Bearers—immortal warriors whose emotions fuel their immense abilities. Along the way, the line between salvation and destruction blurs as Nishi and Amelia struggle to protect each other and their world from the impending calamity.

Key features

  • A mix of 2D and 3D stylized graphics with various customizations

  • Shape your story in an immersive narrative-driven experience.

  • Unique characters with individual skills and upgrades that synergize with different builds

  • Elements and elemental reactions bring more depth into your choices

  • Relic and rank-up system brings build customization outside of battles

  • CO-OP mode to play with friends

  • Twitch integration

  • Waifus I guess

  • Constant improvements based on player feedback

  • All that and more for literally free!

Note from the developer

Making a game with a story and scope as ambitious as Requiem for the Lost World was a long-running child's dream of mine. With recent advancements in tech, I finally decided to bring my idea closer to reality!

I hope you will enjoy playing my game as much as I enjoy providing new and fresh content to all of you!

content_descriptors.notes: Descriptions of injuries and death may be present in story content.

name: Requiem For a Lost World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5/AMD Ryzen or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: intel i5/AMD Ryzen or newer
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Requiem For a Lost World is a singleplayer/co-op roguelite bullet-hell game combining the fun of destroying thousands of enemies with unique builds and a pleasing stylized anime graphics. Unlock new characters, collect powerful weapons and create synergies with elemental reactions!
